author: arwer13
content:
We’ve posted about Withdrawal Credentials Exits Based On A Generalized Message Bus 
https://ethresear.ch/t/withdrawal-credentials-exits-based-on-a-generalized-message-bus/12516
and would be happy to get some feedback.

Perhaps (the post states the question in more detail), it’s worth adding 0x01 withdrawal credentials initiated exits along with the withdrawals in Capella. If so, we’d like to continue the corresponding EIP earlier, but kind of stuck at the moment without some input from the community.
